metadata.Title: CVE-2020-23903 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A Divide by Zero vulnerability in the function static int read_samples of Speex v1.2 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (DoS) via a crafted WAV file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-23903` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libspeex1 - 1.2~rc1.2-1ubuntu2.1
libspeexdsp1 - 1.2~rc1.2-1ubuntu2.1
speex - 1.2~rc1.2-1ubuntu2.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: speex package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2~rc1.2-1ubuntu2.1').
